title: code.highlight()
summary: Wikidot allowed you to make code blocks, but the syntax highlighting was very minimal. So I did what any sane coder would do and wrote my own parser!
long_summary: Wikidot allowed you to make code blocks, but the syntax highlighting was very minimal. But as a programmer, I care perhaps more than I should about the beauty of code plastered on the screen. So I did what any sane coder would do and wrote my own parser!
